p: Gao Kun et al. [ 45] studied the antifungal active ingredients of Astilbe myriantha Diels, and finally isolated and identified an active triterpenoid: 3β, 6β, 24-trihydroxyurs-12-en-27-oic acid (38), whose IC50 was 13.9 mg/L. Breonadia salicina acetone extract [ 46] has an inhibitory effect on variety of Penicillium, and the MIC concentration of inhibiting P. digitatum is 0.16 mg/mL, from which a major active triterpenoid composition i.e., ursolic acid (39) was isolated and identified.
